data.quote: Some walks you have to take alone.
data.author: unknown

data.quote: May you never forget how far you have come and the miles it took just to get to this place.
data.author: Morgan harper nicolas

data.quote: If people are doubting how far you can go go so far that you can't hear anymore.
data.author: Michele ruiz

data.quote: Success isn't oveernight. It's when every day you get a little better than before. It adds up.

data.quote: People react to criticism in different ways, and my way is definitely to come out fighting.
data.author: David beckham

data.quote: The secret is to believe in your dreams; in your potential that you can be like your star. Keep searching, keep believing and donâ€™t lose faith in yourself.

data.quote: There is no pressure when you're making dream come true.
